version_comment: Version will be of x.x.x format. Incase if we need to force alert users for any update, append .xx (Ex: 1.5.6.01)
description:
We have a new update available on asset store. Get more information from 
 Window->VoxelBusters->Native Plugins->NPSettings

news.Cross Platform Native Plugins: New update 2.0 available which has massive performance boost
news.Cross Platform Replay Kit: New plugin released. Upgrade from Native Plugins at a lower price
